Package task1

Class MetroStationWithList

java.lang.Object
task1.AbstractMetroStation
task1.MetroStationWithCollection
task1.MetroStationWithList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationWithFile
public class MetroStationWithList extends MetroStationWithCollection
The MetroStationWithList class represents metro station data with an ArrayList of operating hours. This class is inherited from the abstract MetroStationWithCollection.
See Also:
